name: Share Skin
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Blood of the Moon © 2013, Paizo Publishing, LLC
duration: 1 min./level or until you return to your body
text: You can possess an animal's body in a manner that functions like magic jar, except as noted here. Your body vanishes while the effect lasts and you don't require a receptacle.
duration_zh: 1分钟/等级 或 直到你回到你体内
text_zh: 除了上文记述的内容之外，你可以如同使用魔魂壶(magic jar) 一般，占据一个动物的身体。当法术效果持续时，你的身体消失，而且你不需要一个容器(Receptacle)。
